title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Three lots of Coldkey cards:LOT 1: HISTORY 20.5.39/20.6.39LOT 2: HISTORY 21.4.23/21.5.23/21.6.23LOT 3: BBCK 1M.37/5M.37/10M.37/20M.37**All cards have been opened/redeemed except for the 5,10,20 Bitbill cards. These are/were not loaded**STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0005MINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JULY 6th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
